name: jQuery rTable
tagline: jQuery plugin which allows you to make your table's columns resizable
body:
### Requirements
[jQuery](https://jquery.com/) 1.3.2+

### Installation
Download [ZIP archive](https://github.com/eplaksin/jquery-rtable/zipball/master) and unpack it to your project folder.
Include CSS and JS files from /dist folder:
```html
<link rel="stylesheet" href="dist/jquery.rtable.min.css">
<script src="jquery.min.js"></script>
<script src="dist/jquery.rtable.min.js"></script>
```

### Demo


### Support or Contact
Having problems or you found bugs in plugin?
Open issue on GitHub repository: https://github.com/eplaksin/jquery-rtable
